snippet: People “definitely shouldn’t give up,” Mr. Obama said in an interview with The Associated Press, adding that fixes were under way.
abstract: Pres Obama urges Americans who have flocked to new government-run Web marketplaces for health insurance not to give up because of technical glitches attributed to greater-than-anticipated demand, saying fixes are under way.
lead_paragraph: People “definitely shouldn’t give up,” Mr. Obama said in an interview with The Associated Press, adding that fixes were under way.

headline.main: Urging Patience, Obama Says Problems With Health Care Sites Reflect Demand
headline.print_headline: Urging Patience, Obama Says Problems With Health Care Sites Reflect Demand

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
